oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of symmetrical sulfones from rongalite: Expansion to cyclic sulfones by ring-closing metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
KHEDKAR, P
GHOSH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sodium formaldehyde sulfoxylate
solid-phase synthesis
olefin-metathesis
cleavage strategy
dibenzyl sulfones
one-step
sulfonamides
heterocycles
catalysts
rucl2(=chr)(pr(3))(2)
rongalite
ring-closing metathesis
sulfones
sulfur heterocycles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple method for the synthesis of symmetrical sulfones using rongalite has been developed. Terminally olefinic sulfone derivatives were subjected to ring-closing metathesis (RCM) reactions to generate cyclic sulfones. ((c) Wiley-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA, 69451 Weinheim, Germany, 2005).
